pageOptions.headline: Repository Importer Privacy Policy
pageOptions.subHeading: We will not, without your permission, sell, publish or share information you entrust to us that identifies you or any person.

collected.why: To authenticate you into the wiki
To authenticate you into the wiki
moreInfo: Your username on http://www.lightninglauncher.com/wiki/, stored encrypted on the device

collected.why: To answer crash reports if neccesary
moreInfo: Optional data. Added on crash reports in case the developer need to contact the user directly.

collected.why: To find and solve crash and errors on the app
moreInfo: Optional data. Data collected by Acralyzer. More information here: https://github.com/ACRA/acra/wiki/ReportContent
Browser history is a list of websites you visit.
The contacts permission is used to store the user/passsword of the wiki only.
User files are files containing your content, such as calendar, photos, text, or video.
The identities permission is used to store the user/passsword of the wiki only.
We will share information with government entities only when required by law or expressly permitted in an emergency.
The authentification process is made using DocuJClient https://github.com/gturri/dokuJClient

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Consumer data resellers sell consumer information to other companies for multiple purposes.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Data analytics providers collect and analyze your data.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Operating systems and platforms are companies that power devices and app stores.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Other apps are apps are other companies you may not currently interact with.

notShared.why: We do not share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Social networks are companies that connect individuals around common interests and facilitate sharing.
